text: Gianluigi Gelmetti OMRI, (11 September 1945 – 11 August 2021) was an Italian- Monégasque conductor and composer. He was born in Rome. He began working for the Berlin Philharmonic Orchestra. From 1989 to 1998 he was the Principal Conductor of the Stuttgart Radio Symphony Orchestra as well as the Schwetzingen Festival. Gelmetti died on 11 August 2021 in Monte Carlo, Italy, one month before his 76th birthday.È morto il maestro Gianluigi Gelmetti, aveva 75 anni ==References== ==Other websites== * Gianluigi Gelmetti biography at the Music Partnership Limited Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian conductors Category:Monegasque people Category:Writers from Rome Category:Musicians from Rome Category:20th-century Italian composers Category:21st-century Italian composers
title: Gianluigi Gelmetti
